name: Mossmire
description:
Welcome to Mossmire! This is an action-adventure open world game created for the Winter Showdown 2022 with the Godot game engine. Venture through the perilous realm in search of treasure while fighting off hoards of vicious enemies. Explore randomly-generated caves in hope of finding gold ore.  And finally go to the Arena to practice combat without worrying about resources.

Note: I am aware of lag issues when this game is run in the browser. I highly recommend downloading for a better experience
